snippet: Organizers of the Iditarod sled-dog race in Alaska have opted for an alternate route this year, citing unsafe conditions and a lack of snow in critical areas of the 1,000-mile trail.
abstract: Official start of Iditarod sled-dog race in Alaska is moved to Fairbanks from Willow because of unsafe trail conditions.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the Iditarod sled-dog race in Alaska have opted for an alternate route this year, citing unsafe conditions and a lack of snow in critical areas of the 1,000-mile trail.
